sources.title: The Spider And The Fly
sources.description: A clever and dedicated French police official, a cleverer master-thief whom he secretly admires, the woman loved by the official who is in love with the thief, at the outbreak of World War I.

metadata.Plot: A clever and dedicated French police official, a cleverer master-thief whom he secretly admires, the woman loved by the official who is in love with the thief, at the outbreak of World War I.
metadata.Actors: Eric Portman, Guy Rolfe, Nadia Gray
